channel.title: Between the Brackets - Programming
channel.description: Low-Latency C++ and Trading System Programming

item.title: Why Your C++ Loop Might Not Run: Volatile & Compiler Optimizations
item.description: Learn how the volatile keyword and compiler optimizations affect control flow in low-latency C++ code.
item.dc:creator: Lovekesh Azad

item.title: Why Integer Math Is So Much Faster Than Floating-Point
item.description: Discover why integer operations outperform floating-point math in C++ and how it impacts performance-critical systems like HFT and low-latency computing.
item.dc:creator: Lovekesh Azad
